text: Arau ami bani icharaa'ilaka sagara para karaalo. Phira'a'una arau tara sain'yabahiniye aud'dhatya sahakarae arau simalanghana karai te'omlokara picha la’le. Arasesata yetiya si dubibalai dharaile tetiya ka’le, ‘ma'i imana anilo ye, niscaya te'omra bahirae ana kono satya ilaha na'i, yara prati bani icharaa'ile imana aniche, arau ma'i muchalimasakalara antarbhukta’
